item.title: Getting started with websphere-liberty
item.description: Installation and Setup # Download: To set up WebSphere Liberty, download the latest zip from WASdev.net. Layout: Once you have the zip, extract it to any location on your file system. The basic layout of a Liberty install is the following: wlp/ # WLP_INSTALL_DIR bin/ # location of scripts such as 'server' dev/ # developer resources (APIs, SPIs, and tools) etc/ # global customizations (server.env or jvm.options) lib/ # platform runtime environment usr/ # user directory servers/ # servers directory server_name # directory containing all information for a given server server.
